query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS evidenceDetails (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  userEvidenceId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceTemplateId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceSubTemplateId INT,
  customFields TEXT,
  section1Title VARCHAR(100),
  section1Content TEXT,
  section2Title VARCHAR(100),
  section2Content TEXT,
  section3Title VARCHAR(100),
  section3Content TEXT,
  section4Title VARCHAR(100),
  section4Content TEXT,
  section5Title VARCHAR(100),
  section5Content TEXT,
  section6Title VARCHAR(100),
  section6Content TEXT,
  section7Title VARCHAR(100),
  section7Content TEXT,
  image1Url TEXT,
  image2Url TEXT,
  image3Url TEXT,
  selectedTheme VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'moe',
  pdfUrl TEXT,
  qrCodeData TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3YLZPes1ubcofMz.root --database PdwWnVF2DAatRAKFwvgWXk --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS evidenceDetails (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  userEvidenceId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceTemplateId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceSubTemplateId INT,
  customFields TEXT,
  section1Title VARCHAR(100),
  section1Content TEXT,
  section2Title VARCHAR(100),
  section2Content TEXT,
  section3Title VARCHAR(100),
  section3Content TEXT,
  section4Title VARCHAR(100),
  section4Content TEXT,
  section5Title VARCHAR(100),
  section5Content TEXT,
  section6Title VARCHAR(100),
  section6Content TEXT,
  section7Title VARCHAR(100),
  section7Content TEXT,
  image1Url TEXT,
  image2Url TEXT,
  image3Url TEXT,
  selectedTheme VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'moe',
  pdfUrl TEXT,
  qrCodeData TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
